topic: 'It feels amazing' - British coach Durde on Super Bowl success
summary: Seattle Seahawks' defensive coordinator Aden Durde says "there's no better feeling" as his side beat the New England Patriots 29-13 to win Super Bowl 60 at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California.
transcript:
[OPENING]
Hello friends! Welcome to Ovi English School. Today, we have a very exciting story about a big sports event in America. We will talk about a British coach who helped his team win a very famous game called the Super Bowl. It is a story about hard work, teamwork, and feeling amazing. Here is a question for you: Which team won the Super Bowl 60? Think about it. I will give you the answer at the end of the episode. We have a free study site for today’s lesson. You can find the link in the description. You can read the story, learn new words, and practice. Let’s start!
We have a free study guide for today's lesson. You can find the link in the description. It has vocabulary lists, exercises, and practice questions.  
[NEWS STORY]
Today, I want to tell you about a very special sports story. It is about a man named Aden Durde. He is from Britain. That means he is British. Aden is a coach. A coach is a person who helps a sports team play better. He is the defensive coordinator for a team called the Seattle Seahawks. Defensive coordinator means he helps the team stop the other team from scoring points. The Seattle Seahawks are a football team in the United States.  

Now, you might wonder, what is the Super Bowl? The Super Bowl is the biggest American football game of the year. It is like a final game where two teams play to see who is the best. Many people watch the Super Bowl on TV. It is a very big event in the USA. This year, the Super Bowl was number 60, so people call it Super Bowl 60. It happened at a place called Levi’s Stadium in Santa Clara, California. California is a state on the west coast of America.  

In this Super Bowl 60, Aden’s team, the Seattle Seahawks, played against another team called the New England Patriots. The Patriots are a very famous team. They have won many Super Bowls before. But this time, the Seattle Seahawks won the game. The final score was 29 to 13. That means the Seahawks scored 29 points, and the Patriots scored 13 points. The Seahawks won by a lot!  

Aden Durde said, “There is no better feeling.” He means that winning the Super Bowl feels amazing. It is the best feeling in the world. Aden worked very hard with his players all year. Now, they are champions. A champion is a winner.  

This win is very special for Aden. He is British, but he works in American football. It is not easy to do that. American football is very popular in the United States, but not so much in Britain. So Aden’s success is big news for British people who love sports.  

The Seattle Seahawks played very well in the game. Their defense was strong. Defense means stopping the other team from scoring. Aden helped the players know how to stop the Patriots. The Patriots tried hard, but they could not win.  

The Super Bowl is more than just a game. It is a big party for many people. There is music, food, and famous singers. People watch the game with friends and family. It is a fun day for many people in America.  

Aden said the feeling of winning the Super Bowl is like no other feeling. It makes him very happy and proud. He said it is a dream come true. That means something he wanted for a long time has happened.  

The Seahawks and Aden Durde worked as a team. Teamwork is very important in sports. Everyone has a job, and they help each other. That is how they won the big game.  

So, to remember: Aden Durde is a British coach. He is the defensive coordinator for the Seattle Seahawks. The Seahawks won Super Bowl 60. They beat the New England Patriots 29 to 13. Aden says winning feels amazing. This story shows us that hard work and teamwork can help us reach big goals.  
[PRACTICE]
QUESTION: Who is Aden Durde? Think about your answer.  
ANSWER: Aden Durde is a British coach for the Seattle Seahawks. Did you get it right? Great job!  

QUESTION: What is the Super Bowl? Can you remember?  
ANSWER: The Super Bowl is the biggest American football game of the year. That is correct!  

QUESTION: Which teams played in Super Bowl 60? Think about your answer.  
ANSWER: The Seattle Seahawks and the New England Patriots played in Super Bowl 60. Well done!  

QUESTION: What was the final score of the game? Can you remember?  
ANSWER: The Seattle Seahawks won 29 to 13. You are doing great!  

QUESTION: Why is winning the Super Bowl special for Aden Durde? Think about your answer.  
ANSWER: It is special because Aden is British and works in American football, and winning the Super Bowl is his dream come true. Excellent work!  
[CLOSING]
Remember my question at the beginning? The answer is the Seattle Seahawks won Super Bowl 60. Did you guess correctly? Today, we learned about Aden Durde, a British coach who helped the Seattle Seahawks win the big Super Bowl game. We also talked about what the Super Bowl is and why this win is very special. If you want to practice more, visit our study site. The link is in the description. You can read the story, learn new words, and take a quiz. Thank you for learning with Ovi English School. Come back tomorrow for more English learning with real news. Every day you listen, your English gets better! Goodbye, friends!
